![](https://stablevm.com/files/logo-manager.png)

[StableVM](https://stablevm.com/) delivers reliable and stable SSD powered and DDoS protected OpenVZ servers! We provision the VPS's using Proxmox VE. The hosting service is unmanaged, however we do offer tech support via support tickets in case of an emergency or trouble with the service.

The datacenter is RBX3 in France. ![](https://stablevm.com/files/frflag.gif)

See our LET Offers: [Click Here](https://stablevm.com/manager/order/main/packages/lowendtalk/)

----------------------------------

**LET 8GB**

    8GB RAM

    25GB SSD Storage
    Unmetered bandwidth @ 200Mbps
    1 x IPv4

$6.45 Per Month (Limited to 5 orders)
